meeting_request.purpose: Help deciding between graduate school and industry work or transfer to a different major
meeting_request.description: Hi, I’m Phillip, a senior in Romance Languages. I’ve taken a lot of interesting courses, but not sure if graduate school is the right fit right now. I’ve been considering industry work or a nonprofit, but I’m not sure if I want to go back to a traditional academic setting. Also, I’m really passionate about Romance languages and literature, but I don’t know if I can make a living doing that. I’m open to exploring options, but I’m not sure where to start. Can you help me think through my career path and potential transfer options? I want to make sure I make the right decision.
